title: What is with mage mains and armor?
body:
All this crying about wanting AP + Armor items for what reason? Yea, AD champs get MR + AD, but do AD champs get AD + Armor?

If anything, there's more items in the game that give AP + Armor than there are items that give AD + Armor...because there aren't any. With this, can we stop with the self-victimization on this front? It isn't working.
